component.name: getTracksOfCurrentUser
component.description: Get a list of the songs saved in the current Spotify user’s library.

component.name: checkTracksOfCurrentUser
component.description: Check if one or more tracks is already saved in the current Spotify user’s library.

component.name: saveTracksForCurrentUser
component.description: Save one or more tracks to the current user’s library.

component.name: removeTracksOfCurrentUser
component.description: Remove one or more tracks from the current user’s library.
